text: Tumhari Paakhi is an Indian television Soap opera created by Sumeet Hukamchand Mittal. It is produced by the Shashi Sumeet Productions. And writed by Saratchand Chattopadhyay. It is broadcast on Life OK wich will be premiered on 11 November 2013 to 21 November 2014. The show stars Shraddha Arya and Mohammed Iqbal Khan in lead roles. ==Cast== * Shraddha Arya as Paakhi Anshuman Rathore / Paakhi Veer Pratap Singh (nee Shekhawat), Anshuman's 1st wife/widow, Veer's wife * Mohammed Iqbal Khan as Anshuman Rathore, Paakhi's 1st husband (Dead) / Aryamann Rathore, Anshuman's younger brother * Varun Badola as Veer Pratap Singh, Anshuman, Aryamann and Lavanya's cousin, Paakhi's 2nd husband * Vivaan Qamar as Cameo Pakhi's Love * Sachin Shroff as Girish, Lavanya's husband * Rukhsar Rehman as Lavanya Girish (nee Rathore), Anshuman's younger sister * Divyam Dama as Ayaan Anshuman Rathore, Anshuman and his 2nd wife's son, Paakhi's step son * Madhura Naik as Tanya Rana, Anshuman's ex-fiancee Vijay Kalvani as Ashok Tej Sapru as Mr. Rana, Tanya's father * Priyanka Bhole as Veer's sister, Anshuman, Aryaman and Lavanya's cousin * Pushkar Goggiaa as Prithvi * Indraneil Sengupta as Rohan, Paakhi's ex-boyfriend Rishi Khurana as Paakhi's brother * Dolly Minhas as Girish's aunt * Vijayendra Kumeria as Vikram * Parakh Madan as Suman * Anita Raj as Anuja (fake) / Devki Rathore, Anshuman, Aryamann and Lavanya's biological mother * Unknown as Anshuman's 2nd wife, Ayaan's mother (Dead) * Jasmine Avasia as Priya Veer Pratap Singh, Paakhi and Veer's adopted daughter ==References== Category:2013 Indian television series debuts Category:2014 Indian television series endings
title: Tumhari Paakhi
